thread.title: SRK Makes An Amazing Start In 2017, Shares Two New Posters Of Raees
thread.title_full: SRK Makes An Amazing Start In 2017, Shares Two New Posters Of Raees

title: SRK Makes An Amazing Start In 2017, Shares Two New Posters Of Raees
text:
facebook 
After the release of the song, Laila Main Laila , from Raees , starring Sunny Leone, we missed Shah Rukh Khan talk about his upcoming film. But to compensate for that SRK didn't share just one, but two new posters of Raees. 
Finally, we see lead actress of the film, Mahira Khan, in one poster. The photo is captioned, " Tu shama hai toh yaad rakhna... Main bhi hoon parwana ". We are eagerly waiting to see more of Mahira and Shah Rukh as the two looked amazing together in the trailer. Tu shama hai toh yaad rakhna... Main bhi hoon parwana... pic.twitter.com/d0Y002yKyT — Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) January 2, 2017 
The second poster has SRK in a bohemian avatar. The picture is captioned #OZaalima, and can be a look from one of Raees' upcoming song. — Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) January 2, 2017 
We just cannot wait for the film to release on 25th January. Photo Credit: Twitter
